title: Missing that level 40 capsule. Could anyone help me or somehow add it?
body: I got to level 40, and I don't have the "grand capsule" that it said I received. That's all I can really say lol. I think I can level up to 41 from a game I got and maybe get it then? Anyone got something I can do?

replies.body:
I've been noticing players not receiving their capsules when leveling up. It's a known issue, but we're still collecting data and looking for a fix!

Be sure to [send us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our Game Support team can get you situated with your hard earned capsule!

Same deal. I got to level 40 and got nothing. 4 days later still level 40, I had just won a game and it said I unlocked a grand capsule from leveling up. Checked my loot and nothing. That was 2 days ago. Yet to receive my rewards.
